text: Norbert Brunner (born 21 June 1942) is a Swiss prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was ordained to the priesthood on 6 July 1968. Brunner was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Sion from 1995 to 2014. He was the President of the Swiss Bishops Conference from 2010 to 2013. Brunner was born in Naters, Valais. He studied at the University of Innsbruck. Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss Roman Catholic priests Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Valais
title: Norbert Brunner
